name: Styx VR DrumSim
summary:
Want to learn to play drums but can't afford the equipment? 
 
Now you can learn and play drums on your Rift or Rift S!!! 
 
With Styx VR DrumSim you can spawn your own drums, set the volume, pitch and Change drums to your own WAV format samples to customize your drumming experience! Record yourself and load songs you want to add a drum beat to. Want to amp up your drums for live performances? disable the headset audio to have it come from your windows pc sound card!
